question: Which special day related to health is observed on the third Wednesday of November?
explanation:
World COPD Day is observed on every third Wednesday of November, across the world. The theme of this year is 'Living Well with COPD - Everybody, Everywhere.'
The day is observed this year on November 18, to create awareness about chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). It is a term used to define a group of progressive lung diseases. As per the WHO estimates, 65 million people have moderate to severe COPD across the world.
